alert.note: Alert for Burnet; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 6:55PM CDT until September 24 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Williamson County in south central Texas... Northeastern Burnet County in south central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 655 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Briggs, or 10 miles south of Copperas Cove, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Jarrell, Florence, Watson, Andice, Briggs, and Sun City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
